categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures Annuals backup stories

nodes.text: So Much More is a comic story that was published as the secondary story of Star Wars Adventures Annual 2019 on August 14, 2019.

On the planet Alderaan, WA-2V was on a search for a young Princess Leia Organa who had ran off into the garden. As Leia was playing she ran into her adoptive mother, Breha Organa who was reading a book alongside R2-D2. She ran over and gave her mother a hug but looked up at a large statue of Queen Padmé Amidala. She then told her the story of Amidala's rise to power.

She explained to Leia that Amidala was a brave queen when she was elected at age fourteen and would do whatever it took to protect her people. She told Leia about her fights and everything her enemies threw at her. But the most important thing to learn was that her most important fights were in the Galactic Senate. Even after her term as queen ended she kept fighting as a senator. She spoke louder for her people when her enemies tried to silence her. Breha explained that she became a beacon of hope as the Galactic Empire rose to power and her shadow still guided them.
Breha told Leia that she must remember what she had told her. She continued and told Leia that she must never forget that she has hope as she is a princess and can be so much more.
